roleset.name: observation, guarding

example.name: arg1
example.text: Our compatriots must continue to keep close watch over the judiciary and voice their expectations .
example.note: *make sure arg1 actually falls within the span in these instance-- tree bank varries on whether it makes 'over _' an arg of the noun, or of 'keep'.

example.name: both args
example.text: Harry Pearce and his Watch over the Embassy in Dakar.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on watch-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls sight-30.2, search-35.2.
